p: Analysis in Swiss Target Prediction [ 18]: The Î²-tubulin models 1SA0, 1FJJ, and 1Z2B were obtained from the Protein Data Bank database (PDB) [ 45]. The structures of the flavonoid compounds detected by UPLC analysis were drawn with the Marvin ChemAxon software [ 46], and their energy minimization was calculated with the Avogadro software [ 47]. The obtained data were converted into an AutoDock format (pdbqt) [ 48], and the values of the chemical interaction energy for the different binding sites were obtained and visualized with the UCSF Chimera software (available to download at https://www.cgl.ucsf.edu/chimera/) [ 49].
